about_the_game:
Welcome to Wutt World! A competitive multiplayer platform where simply being the fastest, isn't enough!

Collect bonuses, PLACE hazards, SURVIVE hazards, EARN hazards, place MORE hazards, outsmart your competition and impress the gods of this mysterious world and prove yourself.

Tons of hidden secrets to achieve and unlock. Stand out; be unique; showcase yourself and do it in style.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Wutt World! A competitive multiplayer platform where simply being the fastest, isn't enough!

Collect bonuses, PLACE hazards, SURVIVE hazards, EARN hazards, place MORE hazards, outsmart your competition and impress the gods of this mysterious world and prove yourself.

Tons of hidden secrets to achieve and unlock. Stand out; be unique; showcase yourself and do it in style.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS: x86_64 or ARM CPU
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, sound
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet is required for online play
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS: x86_64 or ARM CPU
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, sound
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet is required for online play
